formdata.value: Mizzen+Main EasyKnit Tee - Ultra-Soft Short-Sleeve Men's T-Shirt - Moisture-Wicking and Quick Dry Tee, Regular Fit

Introducing the Mizzen+Main Men's EasyKnit Tee - The Ultimate Men's Shirt for Unmatched Comfort and Versatility. Are you tired of settling for ordinary men's shirts that sacrifice comfort for style? Our Mizzen+Main EasyKnit Tee is here to revolutionize your wardrobe and elevate your everyday style to new heights. Crafted with precision and designed for the modern man, this men's tee is a game-changer. The regular fit ensures a flexible and comfortable feel throughout the body, giving you the freedom to move with ease. Say goodbye to restrictive and uncomfortable shirts - our EasyKnit Tee is made true to size for the perfect fit. Made from ultra-soft and lightweight fabric, it's easy to wear, easy to layer, and easy to clean. With its superior comfort and luxurious feel, this tee is about to be the most versatile shirt in your closet. Our short-sleeve tee was created to elevate a style that has become an everyday staple. Softer, stretchier, and more comfortable than any other t-shirt out there, this style is just as ready to hit the town as it is to stay home and lay low. From casual outings to formal events, this tee will always have you looking sharp. No more ironing or dry cleaning, simply machine wash it cold, inside out for best results, and hang dry. Save time and money with our low-maintenance t-shirt. With its 50% polyester and 50% modal fabric content, this men's t-shirt is the epitome of comfort and style. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a game of tennis, or simply lounging at home, this men's golf shirts are your go-to choice. Its versatility and timeless design make it a perfect gift for men who appreciate quality and style. It's time to say goodbye to dull and uncomfortable shirts and hello to a world of fashion and comfort. Because we believe that out of comfort comes confidence. And out of confidence comes a new way to walk into work, the weekend & anywhere in between.

request.description:
Sample Response

``` json
{
    "product": {
        "_id": "65511d2c541007d717f63d4b",
        "name": "Cantu Smoothening Curling Conditioner",
        "description": "Cantu curling conditioner contains no silica or laxatives.",
        "price": 25.99,
        "rating": 5,
        "colors": [],
        "image": "http://localhost:3000/public/uploads/sunflower-1699814700397.png",
        "images": [
            "http://localhost:3000/public/uploads/meme_head-1699814700397.jpeg",
            "http://localhost:3000/public/uploads/ic_task_completed-1699814700401.png",
            "http://localhost:3000/public/uploads/fountain-1699814700401.png",
            "http://localhost:3000/public/uploads/fence-1699814700402.png"
        ],
        "reviews": [
            {
                "_id": "656d06444ac72a6d449ff90d",
                "user": "6561fd0c112d2c6c7eebd746",
                "userName": "Mobile Test",
                "comment": "Best Conditioner I've ever used, I can't leave a better comment than this.\nPS: you actually could mix in a little water and it will still retain it's consistency. I cut mine in half, then put them in two separate containers, then filled them both up with water, stirred them till it was consistent again, and voila, I had two 200ml containers filled with conditioner. Best decision I've ever made.",
                "rating": 5,
                "date": "2023-12-03T22:50:44.641Z",
                "__v": 0
            }
        ],
        "sizes": [],
        "category": "65510d02cb038be1903ccd4c",
        "countInStock": 245,
        "dateAdded": "2023-11-12T18:45:00.701Z",
        "__v": 2,
        "numberOfReviews": 1,
        "id": "65511d2c541007d717f63d4b"
    },
    "review": {
        "user": "6561fd0c112d2c6c7eebd746",
        "userName": "Mobile Test",
        "comment": "Best Conditioner I've ever used, I can't leave a better comment than this.\nPS: you actually could mix in a little water and it will still retain it's consistency. I cut mine in half, then put them in two separate containers, then filled them both up with water, stirred them till it was consistent again, and voila, I had two 200ml containers filled with conditioner. Best decision I've ever made.",
        "rating": 5,
        "_id": "656d06444ac72a6d449ff90d",
        "date": "2023-12-03T22:50:44.641Z",
        "__v": 0
    }
}

 ```

    {
        "_id": "656d06444ac72a6d449ff90d",

I cut mine in half, then put them in two separate containers, then filled them both up with water, stirred them till it was consistent again, and voila, I had two 200ml containers filled with conditioner.
